description.name: polpolygon
description.tagline: POL Polygon Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto polygon-pol Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept POL Polygon directly on your website
Unique polygon/pol receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your polygon/pol wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
